name: L6 Group 2 - Gaia
description:
Gaia is a 2D idle/pet sim game where players care for a number of slimes on a tranquil floating island. Slimes are mixed, fed and eventually given quests to earn tasty rewards to upgrade your slimes further.

This game is being created as part of UOS Student's final group project.

Programmer:

Elliot Chester

Designers:

George Heath-Collins

Thomas McCarthy

Thomas McLaren
